document.full_text: "it's no mean feat to produce a powerful essay on a highly personal subject," the author alan gelb writes. "but the good news is that we all have stories within us that deserve to be told. in the quieter, less pressured time of summer, those stories stand a better chance of coming into their own."
document.title: juniors, start your essays
lines_and_colors: "it's no mean feat to produce a powerful essay on a highly personal subject," the author alan gelb writes. "but the good news is that we all have stories within us that deserve to be told. in the quieter, less pressured time of summer, those stories stand a better chance of coming into their own."
